nodes.text: A fusion shunt was a type of secondary mode used for lightsaber blades. They were enabled when a Jedi modified the power output of their lightsaber, which amplified the power and profile of the blade when the fusion shunt was activated.
Fusion shunts were mentioned in Rise of the Separatists, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
